column4: My keyboard is lagging badly. Every 5 seconds or so it doesnt type, and then spits out all i typed afterwards. This goes on in all applications and even on tty's. Anyone have a clue about what is going on? It just started doing so after it woke up from sspend and has been doing so even after numerous restarts.
Dont have any other os iIIIIIIin bios it works fine
no, its the keyboard on a thinkpad r61i
did you try with a USB keyboard?
is just the keyboard crashing during these moments, or is everything freezing for a few seconds? Do you notice abnormal processor usage, at those instants?
